### Hello, I'm Tiago!  
I'm a Professor at the Faculty of Medicine of the University of Porto (FMUP), with academic training in Health Sciences and Digital Health. I'm the Co-Director of the Master’s in Medical Informatics at FMUP and a member of RISE@Health – Health Research Network, within the thematic line on Digital Transformation, Artificial Intelligence, Data and Decision Sciences in Health.  

Learn more about [me](/about.qmd).
